D

Database - Class in blackcode.uiclass
This class is use to do all database related activities
Database() - Constructor for class blackcode.uiclass.Database
 
dbConnect() - Static method in class blackcode.uiclass.Database
This method will create the database connection if the connection is null or close
decryptBackupFile(String, String) - Static method in class blackcode.uiclass.Database
This method will decrypt the backup file and import it as the new database
deleteNote(int) - Static method in class blackcode.uiclass.Database
This method will delete the note that belong to the current user
deleteUser(int) - Static method in class blackcode.uiclass.Database
This method will delete the user details with the notes that belong to the user
doesNoteExist(int) - Static method in class blackcode.uiclass.Database
This method will check if the note exists on the database or not
